videos.description: Myles Turner connects on a 3-pointer as the shot clock expirees with Andre Drummond trying to defend him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Myles Turner drains 3 with Drummond in his face) 2021/11/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Myles Turner drains 3 with Drummond in his face

videos.description: Malcolm Brogdon finds Kelan Martin for the 3-pointer as the Pacers are cruising.
videos.headline: Brogdon feeds Martin for 3
